settings.title: Ingredients
settings.text:
At the heart of Hydro Burn is elemental magnesium: our powerhouse ingredient that activates pure molecular hydrogen when dropped into water.

This clean, science-backed reaction releases ultra-pure hydrogen gas with zero unwanted byproducts, supporting cellular energy, oxidative balance, and metabolic efficiency.

To enhance this process, we use a thoughtfully curated blend of natural acids—malic acid (from apples), tartaric acid (from grapes), and adipic acid (from sugar beets). Together, they help break down the magnesium and optimize hydrogen release.

For a refreshing experience, we use real raspberry powder and a hint of sweetness from Chinese Blackberry leaf extract—a naturally sweet, calorie-free ingredient. The result? A clean, delicious boost your metabolism will love.

settings.title: How to use
settings.text:
HOW TO USE


Hydro Burn is designed for daily use. Most people take one tablet per day to support energy, metabolism, and cellular vitality.

On days when you need a little extra, after an intense workout, a long day, or when you’re feeling off, you can enjoy up to 2–3 tablets.

Consistency matters. Daily use helps optimize cellular energy, regulate oxidative stress, and support long-term metabolic balance.

STORAGE

Keep tablets in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight and moisture, to maintain effectiveness.

A QUICK NOTE
As with any supplement, we recommend checking with your healthcare provider before starting, especially if you’re pregnant, nursing, have any medical conditions, or are taking medications.

Have more questions? See our FAQs.

WHY hydro burn?
Elemental Magnesium

A pure, science-backed magnesium compound that releases molecular hydrogen when dissolved in water.


Molecular hydrogen is nature’s smallest yet most potent antioxidant. It helps neutralize inflammation at the source, especially in the gut, while improving cellular hydration and supporting long-term vitality. It’s a foundational ingredient for anyone looking to age with balance, energy, and ease.
Backed by 1,500+ scientific studies, Hydro Burn works by

○ Regulating oxidative stress – The root cause of sluggish metabolism and fatigue. 

○ Enhancing mitochondrial energy production – The powerhouse of your metabolism.

○ Improving recovery & endurance – Supporting faster muscle & cellular repair.

○ Supporting insulin sensitivity – Helping the body manage energy more effectively.

settings.title: Molecular Hydrogen Enters the Body
settings.text: Hydro Burn infuses water with Molecular Hydrogen (H₂), a clinically studied compound with over 1,500 research publications on oxidative stress, metabolism, and longevity. Once consumed, H₂ molecules rapidly absorb into the bloodstream and reach cells.

settings.title: Selective Reduction of Oxidative Stress
settings.text: Unlike traditional antioxidants, Molecular Hydrogen is selective, meaning it only targets and neutralizes harmful free radicals, while preserving beneficial oxidative functions needed for metabolism. This reduces oxidative stress, a primary factor in metabolic slowdown, inflammation, and fatigue.

settings.title: Mitochondrial Energy Optimization
settings.text: Molecular Hydrogen penetrates deep into mitochondria, improving their efficiency in energy (ATP) production. This results in sustained energy levels, better endurance, and enhanced recovery—without stimulants. Improved mitochondrial function supports long-term metabolic efficiency and longevity.

settings.title: Metabolic Balance & Long-Term Benefits
settings.text: By regulating oxidative stress and enhancing mitochondrial efficiency, Hydro Burn supports metabolic balance. Studies show potential improvements in insulin sensitivity, faster recovery times, and sustained metabolic function over time. No caffeine, no crashes: just clean, intelligent metabolic support.
